ERR_GETDATA.MESSAGE: Instagram permissions have not been set

NO_PERMESSI.TITLE: Invalid permissions!
NO_PERMESSI.MESSAGE: The access permissions to your Facebook data are invalid or expired. Add the data source to update them.

NO_RIMOZIONE.TITLE: Error removing graphics.
NO_RIMOZIONE.MESSAGE: It was not possible to remove all the graphs. Please try again later or contact support.

NO_ORDINAMENTO.TITLE: Operation failed.
NO_ORDINAMENTO.MESSAGE: It is not possible to activate the "sort mode" because the dashboard is empty.

SUC_ORD.TITLE: Dashboard ordered
SUC_ORD.MESSAGE: The dashboard has been successfully ordered!

ERR_ORD.TITLE: Error when ordering the dashboard
ERR_ORD.MESSAGE: The dashboard could not be ordered. Please try again later or contact support.

ERR_CARICAMENTO.TITLE: Error in dashboard upload
ERR_CARICAMENTO.MESSAGE: An error was encountered while loading the dashboard. Please, try again or contact support.

NO_INIZ.TITLE: Error initializing the dashboard.
NO_INIZ.MESSAGE: The dashboard could not be recovered. Please contact support.

ERR_AGG.TITLE: Error during update
ERR_AGG.MESSAGE: Something went wrong choosing the data to be displayed. Please, try again.

NO_CLEAR.TITLE: Error cleaning the dashboard.
NO_CLEAR.MESSAGE: There are no graphs to delete.

ERR_PERMESSI.TITLE: Invalid permissions
ERR_PERMESSI.MESSAGE: The permissions to access your website data are invalid or expired. Add the data source to update them.

NO_DATI.TITLE: Error adding chart

NO_ADD.TITLE: : The chart could not be added to the dashboard.

FULL_GRAF.TITLE: No graphic available
FULL_GRAF.MESSAGE: You have already added all the charts currently available for this dashboard.

NO_ACCESSO.TITLE: Error accessing data!
NO_ACCESSO.MESSAGE: An error occurred while accessing data. Please, try again or contact support.

OK_ACCESSO.TITLE: Service configured correctly!
OK_ACCESSO.MESSAGE: The configuration of the chosen service was successful.

NO_AGG.TITLE: Update error

NO_PROFILO.TITLE: Update error
